rComments: Nicest teacher I've ever had; favorite yet. I had Social Justice for College 10 and the topic was very interesting to me. She assigns the reading and just be able to participate in class a little bit here and there. Willing to help on anything. I took AP Rhet in HS so writing was fairly easy. Not very hard essay topics, and grades very leniently.

Good professor, and tries hard not to offend anyone which can be hard when teaching about social injustice and the room is full of different people with different ethnic backgrounds. She does take WAY too long to grade essays but does give back great feedback. Essays are not hard, and the longest one was like 5 pages.

One of the best professors I've ever had! She always kept the discussion going & was passionate about writing. She would literally write you a paper of feedback after every essay because she truly cared about improving your writing. Went to her office hours a lot and she was very helpful and personable. Basically, she's an amazing ball of sunshine.
Beth is very sweet, super hot! with flexible hours and was always glad to give extra chances on essays. She was always excited to teach and again super hot.

She is so cute. She is endearing and very relatable because she is so young. She is flexible with due dates if you talk to her. sweet teacher and knows how to keep a good discussion going. recommend. <3
